title: Tandoori chicken thighs
ingredients: ['350g natural yoghurt', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '2 tablespoons freshly grated root ginger', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '4 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '16 chicken thighs', 'olive oil']
